data.title: Areas of Study
data.meta_description: Our areas of study offer students a wide choice of academic specialties with courses taught by faculty who are leaders in their fields.
data.text:
Our areas of study offer students a wide choice of academic specialties with courses taught by faculty who are leaders in their fields. GW Law creates a vibrant community through our rigorous academic programs, including, but not limited to, business, constitutional, criminal, environmental, government procurement, intellectual property, international and comparative, national security and U.S. foreign relations, and tax law. GW Law is also home to innovative programs, such as our clinics, study abroad and exchange programs, and public interest and pro bono experience.

All Areas of Study
